item.description:
Sebastian Maniscalco is my favorite comedian. He is very funny! Some say he's the next Jerry Seinfeld. Below is a link to a clip so you can decide if he's your type of comedian too. If he is, sign up for this event.

http://www.youtube.co...


Show starts at 6 pm.
Stay afterwards to eat, play in the casino or head on over to the 70's - 80's dance at Indian Meadows.

We'll meet at 5:30 in front of the entrance to Catch a Rising Star Comedy Club At Twin River

Price: $21
Due upon arrival to Jacki in cash.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance to the comedy club
item.name: Comedian at Twin River
